*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R Wightman, March 13, 1830. Instructions for surveying*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Memorandum for *person_mentioned*Mr. Weigh[t]man Surveyor*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*You will lay off*location_mentioned* four quarters of a League next below *person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned* on the west side of colorado*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*the balance on both sides of the river below *person_mentioned*Betts */person_mentioned*on the east side, and below the above mentioned quarters on the west*/location_mentioned* will be laid of in League tracts—each League will not have more than *location_mentioned*two thirds of a League in width in a straight line front on the river*/location_mentioned*, and the *location_mentioned*quarters in propor- tion to their area*/location_mentioned* I also wish the exact quantity ascertained in each of the *location_mentioned*large islands*/location_mentioned* including the *location_mentioned*prairie island between the east and west fork*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*Leagues on Trespalacios must join those on the colorado*/location_mentioned* where it can be done so as not to reduce the *location_mentioned*fronts on each river */location_mentioned*to less than three thousand varas— should there be a vacancy in the middle it can be laid off in *location_mentioned*quarters*/location_mentioned*, or in *location_mentioned*Leagues */location_mentioned*as may best suit.*/p*
*p*I think it will be the best plan to lay off on one connected plot all the meandering and then lay down all the tracts on *location_mentioned*colorado*/location_mentioned* and on the *location_mentioned*east side of Trespalacios*/location_mentioned*, the*location_mentioned* west side of Trespalacios*/location_mentioned* may remain for the present, as there are no tracts taken there at this time*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*land on prairie creek and Cany */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*below *person_mentioned*Peyton */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Curtis*/person_mentioned* */location_mentioned*and also on the *location_mentioned*bay east of this*/location_mentioned* you can lay off in conformity with the printed regulations and in quarters or Leagues as it may be wanted.*/p*
*p*Please send up the notes of all the *location_mentioned*colorado tracts*/location_mentioned* as soon as possible for they are generally all taken up and I wish to finish the deeds.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Matagorda */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-13-1830">March 13. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*You will of course be particular that there is no interference with the *location_mentioned*Colorado and prairie Creek tracts*/location_mentioned* and regulate the *location_mentioned*fronts*/location_mentioned* accordingly should it be necessary to vary from the rule above laid down to avoid an interference.*/p*
*p*A *location_mentioned*district */location_mentioned*can be laid off for surveying on *location_mentioned*San Jacinto*/location_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*commence at the Mouth of Buffalo Bayou*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*thence up the same*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*north side to its head*/location_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*thence northwardly so as to include all the waters of San Jacinto on the west side of its main branch up to its head*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Weightman*/person_mentioned* can have this *location_mentioned*district */location_mentioned*if he wishes it by applying to me or to *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*at my *location_mentioned*office */location_mentioned*should I be absent within six weeks from this time*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Matagorda */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-13-1830">March 13. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric*/p*]
*p*The above is subject to the approval of the *person_mentioned*Commissioner general*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
